Extension_Description.message: Live preview of CSS/LESS changes with an in-page editor. Write code in CSS/LESS, convert code from Less to CSS & CSS to Less, beautify, minify, syntax highlighting, etc.

Extension_Name.message: MagiCSS - live editor for CSS and LESS

Include_CanRunOnOtherPages.message: You can run it on other web pages and websites.

Include_GrantPermisssions.message: You need to grant permissions by going to:

Include_MagicssDoesNotOperateOnSomeTabs.message: MagiCSS does not operate on Chrome extension pages and some other native tabs.

Include_RequiresYourPermission.message: It requires your permission to execute on:
